dublin_core.dcvalue: Attentional retraining AR is a potential new treatment for addiction AR trains addicts to attend away from drug related cues thereby reducing exposure to drug cues and reducing craving We examined the utility of delivering AR to smokers on a personal digital assistant PDA in the natural environment
Health psychology : official journal of the Division of Health Psychology, American Psychological Association
Attentional retraining administered in the field reduces smokers' attentional bias and craving.
